CustomizationsOverallRatingDecimalPlaces.title: How many decimal places to show for the overall rating

exactMatch.title: Exact Match returns only exact matches

ReviewWidgetLayout.title: The layout of the widget (feed, carousel, badge)

ScheduleReviewRequestRequestScheduleCond.description:
ScheduleConditions define the conditions that must be met before the
review request is sent.

Note 1: Unless otherwise configured here, the time_range values are relative
to the timezone of the account group that is sending the review request.

Note 2: Setting all of the "time_range_" values to 0 means that the review
request can be sent at any time of day - assuming the other wait conditions
are also met.

daysOfWeek.title: The days of the week to send requests on

daysUntilNextRequest.description:
The minimum number of days since the last review request to a contact.
Any requests sent within this time frame will be ignored.

timeRangeEndHour.title:
The hour component for the latest time where it is acceptable to send the
review request (see notes above)

timeRangeEndMinute.title:
The minute component for the latest time where it is acceptable to send the
review request (see notes above)

timeRangeStartHour.title:
The hour component for the earliest time where it is acceptable to send the
review request (see notes above)

timeRangeStartMinute.title:
The minute component for the earliest time where it is acceptable to send
the review request (see notes above)

isWhitelistedByDefault.title: Indicates whether the attribute is whitelisted by default

SourceAttributeScope.title: AttributeScope provides details on whether an attribute (partner, taxonomy, location) is whitelisted, blacklisted or on by default

SourceIcon.title: URLs to an image icon of the source

SourceListingInteractionHTML.title: HTML Information about interacting with a source

StylingTheme.title: The theme to use for the widget

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

endDate.title: time range for when the review request was sent

startDate.title: time range for when the review request was sent

address.title: The address of the bing place on bing maps

name.title: The name of the bing place on bing maps

url.title: The bing maps url of the bing place

canRespond.title: Represents whether or not the response is supported

unsupportedReason.title: A message with the reason the review doesn't support responses

v1Channel.description: The channel to send the review request through.

v1CheckFeatureStatusResponse.title: Response indicating the status of features for an account group

isUsed.title: Whether the widget is being used

agentName.title: The name of the agent who creates the response

approvalRequestedDate.title: When the review response request is approved

commentId.title: The identifier for the review response

created.title: When the review response was created in the system

feedback.title: The feedback to the review response

feedbackProvider.title: The person who provides the feedback

modified.title: When the review response was last modified by the system

replyToEmail.title: The email to receive approval notifications for the response

response.title: The response content to the review

tags.title: The tags for the review response

taskId.title: The identifier of the task in task manager

v1ConciergeReviewResponse.title: ConciergeReviewResponse represents a Concierge ReviewResponse in the ReviewService

v1ContactDetails.description:
Information about the customer (contact) who submitted the NPS score.
This represents the customer who provided the feedback, not the employee/provider who provided the service.

postedByOwner.title: Whether this comment is a post by the owner of the listing being reviewed

accountGroupId.title: Account Group ID the template will be under

externalTemplateId.title: external template id of the sms template

partnerId.title: Partner ID the template will be under

templateId.title: template id of the sms template

v1CreateReviewRequestSMSTemplateResponse.title: CreateSMSTemplatesRequest for storing the SMS template

responseTemplateId.title: The id of the review response template created

headerText.title: The header text to display instead of 'Reviews from our customers'

emailTemplateHtml.title: The html string of email template

maxDateTime.description: Optional. Filter reviews published on or before this date (RFC3339 UTC, inclusive).

minDateTime.description: Optional. Filter reviews published on or after this date (RFC3339 UTC, inclusive).

namespaces.title: Required. The IDs of the namespace(s) you wish to get metrics for. A namespace may be an account_group_id (AG-) or multi-location-group (G-)

partnerId.description: Required. Partner ID of the namespaces provided in the request (e.g., "ABC").

sourceNames.description:
Optional. Filter by source platform. To filter multiple platforms, provide multiple elements in the array
Each entry in this repeated field must be a single source name Example: ["Google", "Yelp", "Facebook"].

splitGroupsIntoAccounts.description:
Optional. Controls metric aggregation granularity for review data.
When false (default): Returns aggregated metrics at the group level (e.g., for multi-location group G-12345).
When true: Returns metrics split by individual account group IDs within the parent group, providing more detailed breakdowns.
Use this when you need to analyze performance differences between individual locations or accounts within a larger organizational group.
Example: A franchise with 10 locations would get 10 separate metric entries instead of 1 combined entry.

externalTemplateId.title: External identifier for the template content

imageUrl.title: Stores the URL of the uploaded image

includeBusinessLogo.title: Include Business Logo based on the flag

title.title: The display name of the SMS template

sourceInfo.title: The source information for the account group in a Struct from JSON

v1Interval.title: Interval of time as delay period for sending review requests

templates.title: The list of templates for the business

v1ListNetPromoterScoresRequest.description: Request message for listing Net Promoter Score records with optional filtering and pagination.

accountGroupId.description: Required. Business account ID (starts with "AG-") to list NPS scores for.

cursor.description:
Optional. Pagination cursor from the previous response. Should be omitted when fetching the first page of results.
For subsequent pages, the cursor value from the previous response should be used.
Cursors are opaque tokens and must be used exactly as returned. Cursor values should not be generated or modified.

hideParent.description: When set to true, parent NPS records (primary feedback marked is_parent=true and referenced by other NPS records via ParentNPSID) are excluded from the response. When set to false, the parent NPS records are included in the response.

includeTriggeringActivityDetails.description: When set to true, triggering_activity_details will be populated with CRM activity information for each NPS record. When set to false, triggering_activity_details will be empty.

pageSize.description:
Optional. Number of items to return per page.
This value must be less than or equal to 500.

v1ListNetPromoterScoresRequest.title: List Net Promoter Scores Request

v1ListNetPromoterScoresRequestFilters.description: Optional filtering criteria for narrowing NPS results.

contactNames.title:
Optional. Filter NPS records by customer/contact names using fuzzy text search.
This performs a case-insensitive search against the contact.name field.
Multiple names can be provided to filter for records matching any of the specified contact names.
Note: This identifies the customer who provided the feedback, not the employee/provider who provided the service.
example: ["Jane Smith", "Michael Johnson", "Sarah Davis"]

fromDate.description: Optional. Include NPS scores submitted on or after this timestamp (RFC3339 UTC, inclusive).

hasEmployeeAssociation.description:
Optional. Filter NPS records based on whether they have associated employees/providers.
When true, returns only NPS records that have employee associations (populated provider_ids or providers fields).
When false, returns only NPS records that do NOT have employee associations.
When omitted/null, returns all NPS records regardless of employee association status.

providerIds.title:
This field filters NPS records by provider (employee) internal IAM user ID (starts with "U-") and not by provider name.
Note: This identifies the employee/provider who provided the service, not the customer (contact) who submitted the NPS.
Accepts IDs only; names are not supported.
example: ["U-e3bbb42b-c464-4326-9c09-aa8cfc45e0b3", "U-fa09664d-698d-4349-926f-147fb55e2a72"]

providerNames.title:
Optional. Filter NPS records by employee/provider names using fuzzy text search.
This performs a case-insensitive search against the names in the providers field.
Multiple names can be provided to filter for records matching any of the specified provider names.
Note: This identifies the employee/provider who provided the service, not the customer (contact) who submitted the NPS.
example: ["John Doe", "Sarah Johnson", "Mike Smith"]

scoreCategory.description: Optional. Filter by NPS score categories: DETRACTORS (0-6), PASSIVES (7-8), PROMOTERS (9-10).

toDate.description: Optional. Include NPS scores submitted on or before this timestamp (RFC3339 UTC, inclusive).

v1ListNetPromoterScoresResponse.description: List of NPS with pagination metadata.

cursor.description:
Cursor for the next page. This value should be used in the next request's cursor field.
Empty string means no more pages. The cursor is an opaque token. It must be used exactly as returned and should not be modified or generated.

hasMore.description: Whether there are more results available.

netPromoterScore.description: NPS score records matching the search criteria for the current page. Empty list if no matches.

totalResults.description: Total count of NPS scores matching criteria across all pages.

cursor.title: Cursor to list the next page of results

totalResults.title: Approximate total results for an unbounded page size

created.title: When the listing was created in the system

domain.title: The domain of the listing URL

externalId.title: The external ID of the listing

lastScraped.title: When the listing was last scraped by the system

lastUserRefresh.title: When the listing was refreshed by the user

matches.title: A list of which fields match the businesses NAP data (companyName, city, state)

missing.title: Indicates if the listing is missing from the sources site

missingOn.title: When the listing was found missing by the system

modified.title: When the listing was last modified by the system

sourceId.title: The source that the listing belongs to

userSubmitted.title: Indicates if the listing was submitted by the user

verified.title: Indicates if the listing was marked verified by the user

ratingFiveStar.title: Number of 5 star ratings from this source

ratingFourStar.title: Number of 4 star ratings from this source

ratingNone.title: Number of reviews with no rating from this source

ratingOneStar.title: Number of 1 star ratings from this source

ratingThreeStar.title: Number of 3 star ratings from this source

ratingTwoStar.title: Number of 2 star ratings from this source

respondedTo.title:
Number of reviews responded to by the business on this source
Only applies to sources that support business responses in platform

responseRate.title: The percentage of reviews responded to from this source

responseTimeHours.title: The average number of hours it takes to respond to reviews from this source

reviewRating.title: The average rating from this source

sourceName.title: The name of the site that the reviews are from

totalReviews.title: Total number of reviews from this source

v1NPSProviderDetails.description: Information about a provider (employee) associated with an NPS record.

id.title:
IAM user ID of the provider (starts with "U-") created or linked when the NPS was received.
Used to fetch provider details such as first name, last name, and external ID from IAM.
example: "U-e3bbb42b-c464-4326-9c09-aa8cfc45e0b3"

name.description: Full name of the provider (example: "John Doe").

v1NetPromoterScore.description:
Represents a customer's Net Promoter Score (NPS) submission, indicating how likely
they are to recommend the business. Scores range from 0–10 and may include comments.

accountGroupId.description: Business account ID (starts with "AG-") associated with this NPS score.

attributes.description: Additional attributes associated with the NPS score (key-value pairs).

comment.description: Optional customer comment provided along with the score.

contactExternalId.description: Contact external id of the user who submitted the NPS score.

contactId.title:
CRM Contact ID of the customer who submitted the NPS score.
This identifies the customer who provided the feedback, not the employee/provider who provided the service.
example: "ContactID-cb3671fd-9cb6-4f8c-86b6-f604e6150aeb"

created.description: Timestamp when the record was created (RFC3339 UTC).

deleted.description: Timestamp when the record was deleted, if applicable (RFC3339 UTC).

netPromoterScoreId.description: Unique identifier for the Net Promoter Score record starts with 'NPS-'.

npsExternalId.description:
External NPS identifier for imported NPS records.
This field stores the external identifier provided during NPS data migration through the ImportNPS API.
It is used for deduplication and reconciliation against the source system.

providerIds.title:
List of IAM user IDs for providers (employees) associated with this NPS record.
These IDs are created or linked when the NPS is received and are used to fetch
example: ["U-e3bbb42b-c464-4326-9c09-aa8cfc45e0b3", "U-fa09664d-698d-4349-926f-147fb55e2a72"]

providers.title:
List of providers (employees) associated with this NPS record.
example: [{id:"U-e3bbb42b-c464-4326-9c09-aa8cfc45e0b3", name: "John Doe"}, {id:"U-fa09664d-698d-4349-926f-147fb55e2a72", name:"Julie"}]

reviewRequestRecordId.description: ID of the review request for which the customer submitted this NPS feedback.

score.description: The NPS score value on a scale of 0-10.

scoreLeftTime.description: Timestamp when the NPS score was submitted by the customer (RFC3339 UTC).

triggeringActivityDetails.description:
Details of the CRM activities that triggered this NPS request.
This field is populated only when:
1) include_triggering_activity_details is set to true in the request, and
2) the NPS request was triggered from a third-party integration that stored triggering_activity_ids in the NPS record.

updated.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated (RFC3339 UTC).

v1NetPromoterScoreAttribute.description: A key-value pair providing additional metadata for an NPS record.

value.description: The attribute value corresponding to the key.

cursor.title: cursor can be passed to retrieve the next page of results keyed by the cursor

pageSize.title: page_size specifies the number of items to return in the next page

v1PagedRequestOptions.title: Paged Request Options provide a standard cursor and page size for paged requests

numberOfPeriods.title: The number of periods to wait before sending the review request

customPromptContent.title: Optional: Custom prompt content for overriding default

goalId.title:
Optional: Goal override target (defaults to GenerateReviewResponse)
Example: "GenerateReviewResponse" or "ChatWithReputationData"

v1Recommendation.title: Enum for a review's facebook recommendation value

v1Review.description: Customer feedback about a business with ratings, comments, and responses.

contactExternalId.description: Contact external id of the user who gave the review.

contactId.title: Contact id of the user who gave the review. (Eg: ContactID-731b80b1-1aae-49ff-8c21-d43aa01e1bf8)

content.description: Full review text. May be empty for star-only reviews.

created.description: When review was ingested into system (RFC3339 UTC). May differ from published.

deleted.description: When review was deleted (RFC3339 UTC). Zero timestamp = not deleted.

domain.description: Platform domain indicating the source where the review was provided. (e.g., "google.com", "yelp.com").

edited.description: When review was last edited by customer (RFC3339 UTC).

externalId.description: Platform's native review identifier (opaque string, often base64-encoded).

hasAccuratePublished.description: Whether published timestamp is accurate (true) or estimated (false, e.g., midday UTC).

isSharedByReviewer.description: Whether reviewer shared review beyond original platform.

lastFailedReviewCommentCreated.description: When most recent response attempt failed (RFC3339 UTC). Zero timestamp = no failures.

lastFailedReviewCommentReason.description: Error reason for failed response attempt. Empty = no failure.

lastFailedReviewCommentText.description: Text of failed response attempt. Empty = no failed response.

listingId.description: Business location identifier. Format: "LIS-" prefix + alphanumeric.

modified.description: When review record was last updated (RFC3339 UTC).

newComment.description: Whether there's an unacknowledged business response.

published.description: When customer published review on platform (RFC3339 UTC).

scaledStars.description: Normalized rating (0-1000 scale, linear interpolation across platforms).

sourceId.description:
Internal platform ID. Common: 10010 (Google), 10000 (Yelp), 10050 (Facebook).
For readable names, use source_name (field 31).

sourceName.description: Readable platform name (e.g., "Google", "Yelp"). May be empty; use source_id as fallback.

title.description: Truncated review text. No ellipsis added if truncated.

url.description: Direct URL to review on platform.

v1ReviewActionStatus.title: Enum for the action status of a review

v1ReviewComment.description: Business response to a customer review.

created.description: When comment was created in the system (RFC3339 UTC).

externalId.description: Platform's native identifier for this comment.

modified.description: When comment was last updated in the system (RFC3339 UTC).

name.description: Display name of commenter (e.g., "Owner" or business name).

postedByAi.description: Whether automatically posted by the reputation specialist (true) or someone else (false).

postedByDigitAgent.description: Whether posted by a digital agent (true) or manually by a human (false).

postedByOwner.description: Whether posted by the business owner (true) or someone else (false).

published.description: When comment was published on the review platform (RFC3339 UTC).

text.description: Full text content of the business's response.

v1ReviewDeletedStatus.title: Enum for the deleted status of a review

accountGroupId.title: Business identifier of the review history

created.title: When the review history was created in the system

externalId.title: The sources identifier of the review

listingId.title: The listing id that the review belongs to

reviewId.title: Review id that the review history belongs to

reviewLastEdited.title: When the review was last modified on the source site

scaledStarRating.title: The scaled stars of the review

source.title: The source that the review belongs to

v1ReviewHistory.title: Represents a ReviewHistory in the ReviewService

namespace.title: The IDs of the namespace(s) the metrics are fetched for. A namespace may be an account_group_id (AG-) or multi-location-group (G-)

accountGroupId.title: Account Group ID the template falls under

externalTemplateId.title: External identifier for the template content

isDefault.title: Whether the template is the default to be used when automatically sending to someone

partnerId.title: Partner ID the template falls under

categories.title: The categories the response template is for

owner.title: The original owner of the response template

ratings.title: The review ratings the response template is for

title.title: The display name of the template

leaveReviewUrl.title: leave-a-review redirection URL to buisness' review page

v1ReviewSourceInfo.title: Review Source information for an account group

averageRating.title: The overall average rating for the account group

totalCount.title: The total number of reviews for the account group

leaveReviewDestination.title: The source ID to direct people to leave a review at, or multiple source IDs joined with comma

email.description: Email address. Often empty due to platform privacy settings.

name.description: Display name as shown on platform (e.g., "John Doe" or "Jane D.").

url.description: URL to reviewer's profile on the platform. May be empty.

v1SMSState.title:
- SMS_STATE_UNDEFINED: SMS state is undefined - should not be returned by the API
 - SMS_STATE_DISABLED: SMS is disabled for the account group
 - SMS_STATE_ENABLED: SMS is enabled for the account group

includeBusinessLogo.title: Include Business Logo based on the flag

locations.title: The list of bing maps locations

v1SearchReviewsRequest.description: Search for reviews with filtering and pagination.

cursor.description:
Optional. Pagination cursor from the previous response. Should be omitted when fetching the first page of results.
For subsequent pages, the cursor value from the previous response should be used.
Cursors are opaque tokens and must be used exactly as returned. Cursor values should not be generated or modified.

includeComments.description:
Optional. Include business response comments in results. Default: false.
Supported platforms: Google (one comment), Facebook, My Listing, Apartments.com, ApartmentRatings.

listingName.description: Optional. Listing name to filter reviews for a specific location.

maxDateTime.description: Optional. Filter reviews published on or before this date (RFC3339 UTC, inclusive).

minDateTime.description: Optional. Filter reviews published on or after this date (RFC3339 UTC, inclusive).

orderByCreatedDateDescending.description:
Optional. Sort by system creation date descending (newest first).
Cannot be true if order_by_published_date_descending is true.

orderByPublishedDateDescending.description:
Optional. Sort by published date descending (newest first).
Cannot be true if order_by_created_date_descending is true.

pageSize.description: Optional. An integer representing the number of reviews returned per page. This value must not exceed 500.

phrase.description: Optional. Search for reviews containing this text (case-insensitive).

rating.description:
Optional. Filter by rating: "1"-"5" (exact), "L" (1-2 stars), "H" (4-5 stars), "N" (no rating).
Can accept single value or comma-separated list (e.g., "1,3,5" or "L,H").

ratingValues.description:
Optional. Filter by rating values: "1"-"5" (exact), "L" (1-2 stars), "H" (4-5 stars), "N" (no rating).
Each entry in this repeated field must be one rating token. (e.g., ["1","3","5"] or ["L","H"]).

sourceIds.description:
Optional. Filter by internal source platform IDs. This field should only be used when numeric IDs are explicitly available.
Each entry must be a single ID string. Example: ["10010", "10000", "10050"].
Note: When filtering by platform names (e.g., "Google", "Yelp"), source_names field should be used instead.

sourceName.description:
Optional. Filter by source platform (e.g., "Google", "Yelp", "Facebook").
Can accept single value or comma-separated list. (e.g., "Google,Yelp").

sourceNames.description:
Optional. Filter by source platform name (e.g., "Google", "Yelp", "Facebook").
This is the preferred field for filtering by platform names.
To filter multiple platforms, multiple elements should be provided in the array.
Each entry must be a single source name. Example: ["Google", "Yelp", "Facebook"].

cursor.description:
Cursor for the next page. This value should be used in the next request's cursor field.
Empty string means no more pages. The cursor is an opaque token. It must be used exactly as returned and should not be modified or generated.

hasMore.title: Whether or not more results exist

reviews.description: Reviews matching the search criteria for the current page. Empty list if no matches.

totalResults.description: Total count of reviews matching criteria across all pages.

enabled.title: Indicates whether the source is enabled/disabled based on the attributes (partner, market, taxonomy, location)

ignoredAnchorDataMatches.title: Indicates certain fields to ignore when comparing anchor data

name.title: The name of the source (ex: Google)

sourceId.title: The Source ID of the listing (ex: 10000)

sourceTypeId.title: The ID of the source type (ex: directory-site)

sourceTypeName.title: The name of the source type (ex: Directory Site)

supportsSubmittingListings.title: Core supports a user manually submitting a listing by URL

v1SourceDetails.title: Indicates which sources are enabled and ignored by the business

v1ThirdPartyPublishedStatus.description: - THIRD_PARTY_PUBLISHED_STATUS_EMPTY: Empty means the auto-publish minimum rating setting determines whether it's published or not
v1ThirdPartyPublishedStatus.title: Enum for review third party published status

minimumPublishRating.title: The minimum star rating to auto-publish reviews, 0 means only manually published reviews

widgetAllReviewsEnabled.title: Whether the widget can show reviews for all sources

v1ThirdPartyReviewPublishSettings.title: Settings for publishing 3rd party reviews to review widget

showHeader.title: Whether or not to show the 'Reviews from our customers' header"

showLeaveAReviewButton.title: Whether to show the "Leave a review" button

showOverallRatingCard.title: Whether to show the overall rating card which shows a summary of the review stats

showOverallRatingTitle.title: Whether to show the title "Overall rating"

showReviewCount.title: Whether to show the total review count

showReviewPublishedDate.title: Whether or not to show the the published date on each review card

showReviewSource.title: Whether or not to show the the source on each review card

showReviewStarRating.title: Whether or not to show the the star rating on each review card

showStarRatingSummary.title: Whether or not to show the average star rating

v1TriggeringActivityDetail.description: Information about the CRM activity that triggered the NPS request.

standardActivitySourceName.description: Source name of the transaction/job e.g. (Neighborly, serviceTitan etc).

systemActivityCreated.description: System creation timestamp of the activity.

systemActivityExternalId.description: Job ID of the source system of the transaction.

systemActivityId.description: Transaction ID from the source system.

paths.description: The set of field mask paths.

vendastatypesFieldMask.title: `FieldMask` represents a set of symbolic field paths, for example:

post.description: List NetPromoterScore feedback records for a business account with optional filtering and pagination.Required OAuth2 scopes: `business-app`, `reputation`, `reputation.nps:read`

requestBody.description: Request message for listing Net Promoter Score records with optional filtering and pagination.

post.description:
Get review metrics by namespaces.

Required OAuth2 scopes: `business-app`, `reputation`, `reputation.review:read`

Search reviews by their IDs.

Required OAuth2 scopes: `business-app`, `reputation`, `reputation.review:read`

requestBody.description: Search for reviews with filtering and pagination.
